Training Plans for Canines and Felinos

Basic Obedience Training

A foundational training program suitable for both dogs and cats. It covers essential commands such as sit, stay, and come. Perfect for pets of all ages.

Duration: 4 weeks

Price: $150

Advanced Agility Training

This program is designed to enhance your pet's agility and coordination. It includes obstacle courses and fun challenges to keep your furry friend active and engaged.

Duration: 6 weeks

Price: $250

Puppy Socialization Classes

Specifically tailored for puppies, this course focuses on socialization skills, preventing behavioral problems, and building a strong bond between you and your furry companion.

Duration: 8 weeks

Price: $180

Contact us to enroll in a training plan for your pet!
